IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO SUPPORT THE CENTRAL NEW MEXICO COMMUNITY COLLEGE
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO SUPPORT THE CENTRAL NEW MEXICO COMMUNITY COLLEGE
IRS990.Description: CNM is the largest post-secondary institution in the State of New Mexico, educating some 30,000 individuals per year. The CNM Foundation is the fundraising and advocacy group promoting CNM and its programs within the community. The Foundation's mission is to provide the extra financial assistance necessary for the citizens of CNM's service area to obtain the quality educational opportunities they deserve.The CNM Foundation provides approximately $170,475 in scholarship support to students at CNM, assisting students with tuition, books and basic life expenses to ensure their success.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: TO PROVIDE SCHOLARSHIPS TO CNM STUDENTS.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Uncertain Tax Positions Under FIN 48:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE FOUNDATION IS AN ORGANIZATION DESCRIBED IN INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (IRC) SECTION 501(C)(3) AND AS SUCH IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAX ON ITS RELATED INCOME UNDER SECTION 501(A). FURTHERMORE, AS A PUBLICLY SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION, IT IS CLASSIFIED AS A PUBLIC CHARITY AND NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION UNDER SECTION 509(A)(1). THE FOUNDATION HAD NO UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME DURING FISCAL YEARS 2010 AND 2009; THEREFORE, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IS INCLUDED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrant: SCHOLARSHIPS CONTRIBUTION TO CENTRAL NEW MEXICO COMMUNITY COLLEGE- SUPPORTS 534 STUDENTS
THE FOUNDATION PROVIDES PROGRAM SUPPORT TO CENTRAL NEW MEXICO COMMUNITY COLLEGE.
NON CASH DONATIONS MADE TO THE FOUNDATION PASSED THROUGH TO CENTRAL NEW MEXICO COMMUNITY COLLEGE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, TREASURER, AND MEMBERS OF THE FINANCE & INVESTMENT COMMITTEE WILL REVIEW THE IRS FORM 990 FOR COMPLETENESS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE TO DONORS AND OTHERS UPON REQUEST. ALSO THE ANNUAL REPORT IS DISTRIBUTED TO DONORS AND OTHER INTERESTED PARTIES.
